alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Rosebud County through 1015 PM MDT... At 941 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Melstone, or 28 miles northwest of Hysham. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Rosebud County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Ponding of water in low-lying areas and on streets is possible, along with light accumulations of small hail. Motorists on US-12 and rural roads should be alert for rapidly changing road conditions.
